name: Clockwork Design Group, Inc
description:
Clockwork Design Group loves a creative challenge. Since 1994, our boutique firm has helped clients develop and implement creative marketing and advertising solutions – from fresh brand identities and web sites to enticing ad campaigns, corporate collateral, direct mail, trade show graphics, animated holiday cards, and more. Whatever the finished product may be, our team works with clients to find rich, compelling and memorable solutions.
Our clients include professional service firms such as law firms, CPAs, financial advisors, architecture, engineering and construction companies, as well as technology firms.
With a name like Clockwork, you can rely on us to keep projects on schedule, on budget and on track. We pride ourselves on professionalism and responsiveness that equal our creative abilities. We communicate with clients at every project step to assure there are no surprises regarding deliverables, timetables and budgets.
The Clockwork culture and mission statement can be summed up in a simple, although somewhat cliched adage: “Do what you love, love what you do.” We are a dedicated group of talented professionals who truly enjoy creating beautiful and functional design. Our clients are our friends and peers, and often comment that our enthusiasm for our work is visible and contagious. We take our work seriously, but have fun doing it!
